Posts.EditableText:
I realized that a new version of Quest came out. The game I am making is on the last version of quest. If someone downloads my game to play on their computer, do they need the same version of quest I used to make the game, for the game to play properly?

Thanks
Posts.HTML:
I realized that a new version of Quest came out. The game I am making is on the last version of quest. If someone downloads my game to play on their computer, do they need the same version of quest I used to make the game, for the game to play properly?

Thanks

Posts.EditableText: Quest should be able to play any game made on the same or earlier versions, so should be fine.
Posts.HTML: Quest should be able to play any game made on the same or earlier versions, so should be fine.
